document.full_text: palestinian leaders formally ended a four-year rift between the secular fatah and islamist hamas groups at a ceremony in egypt wednesday, a reconciliation they see as crucial to their drive for an independent state.
document.title: palestinians end four-year rift at cairo ceremony
lines_and_colors: palestinian leaders formally ended a four-year rift between the secular fatah and islamist hamas groups at a ceremony in egypt wednesday, a reconciliation they see as crucial to their drive for an independent state.
